Uses of Class
goGame.Stone

    • Uses of Stone in goGame

      Methods in goGame that return Stone 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Stone Player.getColor()
      Returns the color of the player.
      Stone Board.getField​(int i)
      Returns the content of the intersection i.
      Stone Board.getField​(int row, int col)
      Returns the content of the intersection referred to by the (row,col) pair.
      Stone Board.getField​(Board.Coordinate2D coordinate)
      Returns the content of the intersection referred to by the 2D coordinate.
      static Stone Stone.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Stone[] Stone.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in goGame with parameters of type Stone 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Board.checkSamePreviousState​(Stone[][] newState)
      Check if the current board state is equal to any previos state.
      int RandomStrategy.determineMove​(Board board, Stone color)  
      int Strategy.determineMove​(Board board, Stone color)  
      void Board.setField​(int row, int col, Stone color)
      Sets the content of the intersection represented by the (row,col) pair to the stone s.
      void Board.setField​(int i, Stone color)
      Sets the content of intersection i to the stone s.
      void Board.setField​(Board.Coordinate2D coordinate, Stone color)
      Sets the content of the intersection represented by the 2D coordinate to the stone s.
